summary:
### January 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/create-eth

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Merged PRs to enhance CLI functionality, including allowing project names as paths during initialization (#208).
  - Added curated extensions for SRE challenges and SpeedRun Ethereum challenges (#198, #197).
  - Introduced initial rules for template arguments (#195).

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved issues with capital letters in extension names, ensuring compatibility (#200).
  - Fixed the Husky pre-commit hook not being executable (#192).
  - Addressed validation for paths in CLI initialization (#208).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on improving developer experience (DX) through better CLI options and curated extensions.
  - Active resolution of bugs related to project setup and extension management.

topIssues.title: Allow project name as path while initializing the CLI
Check failure when a Version Package PR already exists
Add SRE challenges extensions as curated
Set the rules for types of arguments depending on different conditions

topPRs.title: Fix: name as path when initializing
Allow capital letters in extension names
Add SRE challenges extensions to curated list
Add SpeedRun Ethereum challenges as curated extensions
